body:
Abraham,

I'm having a bit of a hard time understanding what is going on in your file but perhaps this is what you are noticing:  The view factor mesh component outputs meshes on a "continuous air volume" basis rather than a zone-by-zone basis.  So, if you have two zones that share an air wall, there will be one mesh output for both zones.  If there is a solid wall between zones, two separate meshes will be output.

Does this answer your question?

-Chris
